Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: January 3, 2026

## Active Technologies
- Backend Node.js 20.x with TypeScript 5.9; Frontend React 18.3 (Vite) + Express 5, Prisma 5, JWT auth middleware, React Router 6, React Query/local data hooks (001-invited-user-status)
- MySQL via Prisma ORM (Invite + User tables) (001-invited-user-status)
- TypeScript 5.x (Node.js 20+), React 18+ + Express, Prisma, React, Vite (001-ticket-issuance)
- MySQL (via Prisma) (001-ticket-issuance)

- JavaScript (Node.js v20+), React 18 + Express, Prisma, React, Vite, Lucide-React (001-admin-event-dashboard)
